title: Tagging Information
description: Tagging information used to form categories of entities.

xdm:tags.title: Tags
xdm:tags.description: The set of tags associated with this entity. The tags are used in filter expressions to constrain the overall inventory to a sub set (category).

items.description: An identifier of a tag object. The value is the @id of the tag that is referenced. See tag schema: https://ns.adobe.com/xdm /taxonomy/tag
